A: 1. Professor Wole Soyinka won the Nobel Prize for Literature in what year? (a) 1990 (b) 1986 (c) 1978
2. Wole Soyinka was born in which Nigerian city? (a) Lagos (b) Ibadan (c) Abeokuta
3. Wole Soyinka is known as a poet, playwright, and _ writer. (a) novel (b) essay (c) short story
4. Wole Soyinka was the first _ to win the Nobel Prize for Literature. (a) African (b) Nigerian (c) Yoruba
5. Chief Anthony Enahoro was born in which month? (a) June (b) July (c) August
6. Chief Anthony Enahoro was a leading anti-colonial and pro-_ activist. (a) government (b) democracy (c) military
7. Chief Anthony Enahoro moved the motion for Nigeria's _. (a) constitution (b) independence (c) unity
8. Nigeria gained independence in what year? (a) 1960 (b) 1963 (c) 1958
9. Alhaja Kudirat Abiola was the wife of Chief MKO _. (a) Awolowo (b) Balewa (c) Abiola
10. Alhaja Kudirat Abiola's husband won the presidential election on June 12, _. (a) 1990 (b) 1993 (c) 1996
11. Alhaja Kudirat Abiola was killed in which year? (a) 1993 (b) 1996 (c) 1999
12. Alhaja Kudirat Abiola fought against _ rule. (a) civilian (b) military (c) traditional
13. A traditional ruler protects the _ and culture of his people. (a) wealth (b) land (c) traditions
14. A traditional ruler is the head of an _ unit or clan. (a) political (b) economic (c) ethnic
15. Which title is used for traditional rulers in Hausa land? (a) Oba (b) Emir (c) Eze
16. The title 'Oba' is used in which land? (a) Igbo (b) Hausa (c) Yoruba
17. Which title is used for traditional rulers in Igbo land? (a) Lamido (b) Shehu (c) Eze
18. One role of traditional rulers is to settle land and _ quarrels. (a) business (b) marriage (c) political
19. Traditional rulers educate people to do their _ duties. (a) personal (b) civic (c) religious
20. Traditional rulers make people obey law and _ in the community. (a) order (b) rules (c) customs
B: 1. Who was the first African to win the Nobel Prize for Literature? _________
2. What year was Chief Anthony Enahoro born? _________
3. Who was Alhaja Kudirat Abiola's husband? _________
4. What title is used for a traditional ruler in Igbo land? _________
5. Name one civic duty traditional rulers educate people about. _________
C: 1. List two roles of traditional rulers in a community.
2. Name three titles of traditional rulers found in Hausa land.
3. Who moved the motion for Nigeria's independence?
4. For what main reason was Alhaja Kudirat Abiola fighting?
5. What are two qualities Professor Wole Soyinka is known for?
answers_C: Custodian of culture; Settle land and marriage quarrels
